name: Tesserot
description:
Rotate 3 dimensions of a tesseract in VR or 2D using a gamepad, motion controllers, or mouse and keyboard.

Controls:

Rotate Tesseract Pitch
W S
Gamepad Left Stick Y / Gamepad D-Pad Up Down
Vive Left Thumbpad Y / Oculus Touch Left Thumbstick Y

Rotate Tesseract Roll
A D
Gamepad Left Stick X / Gamepad D-Pad Left Right
Vive Left Thumbpad X / Oculus Touch Left Thumbstick X

Rotate Tesseract Yaw
Q E
Gamepad Triggers Left Right

Toggle between Pitch and Yaw rotations
Tab
Gamepad Left Stick Click
Vive Left Thumbpad Click / Oculus Touch Left Thumbstick Click

Drop and pick up tesseract
Mouse Left Click
Gamepad A
Vive Right Thumbpad Click / Oculus Touch Right Thumbstick Click

Dolly tesseract forward and backward
Mouse Wheel
Gamepad Shoulders Left Right
Vive Right Thumbpad Y / Oculus Touch Right Thumbstick Y

Reset VR view
R
Vive Left Grip / Oculus Touch Left Grip

Hold scaled down tesseract for closer inspection
Vive Trigger Left Right / Oculus Touch Trigger Left Right
